name: My Office
description:
New Visual Novel for adults. You play the role of a young man hired by RiverApp, a large company in the app market. Choose your path and decide the course of the story to take.



It all starts as a classic career success story: the main character is ambitious, motivated and tries to make a name for himself in a large metropolis, working for one of the largest companies in the app market. However, what the people around him don't know is that the protagonist has a secret that he carefully hides.
Although he tries to go unnoticed and keep a low profile, he soon discovers that the company also hides secrets and problems that he will have to face.



************************************************************************************
Developer Notes:
Playing or participating in the game forum means supporting the project and its creator. So the game will soon have an end and improve in every aspect, making this story unique.
Thank you all.
